metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of ground truth measurements synchronizing with the airborne WiDAS mission in the Linze station foci experimental area on Jun. 29, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽站加密观测区机载WiDAS地面同步观测数据集（2008年6月29日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of ground truth measurements synchronizing with the airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the Linze station foci experimental area on Jun. 29, 2008. WiDAS, composed of four CCD cameras, one mid-infrared thermal imager (AGEMA 550), and one infrared thermal imager (S60), can acquire CCD, MIR and TIR band data. The simultaneous ground data included:
     (1) soil moisture (0-5cm) nine times by the cutting ring (50cm^3) along LY06 and LY07 strips, and once by the cutting ring method and once by ML2X Soil Moisture Tachometer in the six points of Wulidun farmland quadrates. The preprocessed soil volumetric moisture data were archived as Excel files.
     (2) surface radiative temperature measured three times by three handheld infrared thermometer (5# and 6# from Cold and Arid Regions Environmental and Engineering Research Institute, and one from Institute of Geographic Sciences and Natural Resources, which were all calibrated) in LY06 and LY07 strips (98 sample points and repeated three times) and the Wulidun farmland quadrates (various points and repeated three times). Data were archived as Excel files.
     (3) maize canopy component temperature measured by the 5# handheld infrared thermometer (from Cold and Arid Regions Environmental and Engineering Research Institute) in Wulidun farmland quadrates. Six directions were measured, canopy backlighting and frontlighting, half height backlighting and frontlighting, the light and the shaded bareland, with each direction 20 measurements. 
     (4) spectrum of maize, soil and soil with known moisture measured by ASD Spectroradiometer (350～2 500 nm) from BNU, and the reference board (40% before Jun. 15 and 20% hereafter) in Wulidun farmland quadrates. Raw spectral data were binary files , which were recorded daily in detail, and pre-processed data on reflectance (by ViewSpecPro) were archived as Excel.files
     (5) mltiangle maize spectrum measured by ASD Spectroradiometer (350～2 500 nm) from BNU, the reference board (40% before Jun. 15 and 20% hereafter), two observation platforms of BNU make and one of Institute of Remote Sensing Applications make in Wulidun farmland. Raw spectral data were archived as binary files, which were recorded daily in detail, and pre-processed data on reflectance and transmittivity were archived as text files (.txt). 
     (6) LAI of maize measured by the fisheye camera (CANON EOS40D with a lens of EF15/28), shooting straight downwards, with exceptions of higher plants, which were shot upwards. Data included original photos (.JPG) and those processed by can_eye5.0 (in excel).
     (7) LAI of maize measured by LAI2000 in Wulidun farmland quadrates. Data educed from LAI2000 periodically were archived as text files (.txt) and marked with one ID. Raw data (table of word and txt) and processed data (Excel) were included. Besides, observation time, the observation method and the repetition were all archived.
     See the metadata record “WATER: Dataset of setting of the sampling plots and stripes in the Linze station foci experimental area” for more information of the quadrate locations.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2008年6月29日在临泽站加密观测区开展机载红外广角双模式成像仪WiDAS（Wide-angle Infrared Dual-mode line/area Array Scanner）航空飞行的地面同步观测。WiDAS由4个CCD相机、1个中红外热像仪（AGEMA 550）和1个热红外热像仪（S60）组成， 能同时获取可见光/近红外（CCD）波段5个角度、中红外波段（MIR）7个角度和热红外波段（TIR ）7个角度的数据。地面同步观测主要包括土壤水分、地表辐射温度、地物光谱、BRDF、LAI-2000测量LAI和鱼眼相机测量LAI。
1．土壤水分观测；观测目标：0-5cm表层土壤。观测仪器：环刀（体积50cm^3）， ML2X土壤水分速测仪。观测样方和采样次数：自东向西第六、七、航线下LY06和LY07样方（环刀9次观测），五里墩农田样方（6个观测点，每个观测点环刀1次采样，ML2X土壤水分速测仪3次重复采样）。预处理数据为土壤体积含水量。样方数据存储：Excel。
2．地表温度辐射观测；观测仪器：手持式红外温度计（寒旱所5#，寒旱所6#，地理所）；仪器均经过定标（请参考手持红外温度计定标数据.xls）。观测样方和采样次数：自东向西第六航线和第七航线下LY06和LY07样方（每个样方49个观测点，每个观测点3次重复）、五里墩农田样方（选多个观测点，每个观测点3次重复）。预处理数据根据热红外定标数据（标准源为黑体），将各仪器的实测温度与相应黑体温度进行直线拟合，求得拟合方程，再利用上述拟合的方程，对观测的原始观测数据进行定标处理。数据存储：Excel。
3．玉米冠层组分温度观测；观测项目：玉米冠层组分温度，包括6个方向：顶逆（冠层顶逆光），顶顺（冠层顶顺光），中逆（冠层中植株1/2高度处逆光），中顺（冠层中植株1/2高度处顺光），光照土（无遮荫裸土），遮荫土（有遮荫裸土）。观测样方和采样次数：五里墩农田样方，每个观测方向20次记录。观测时间在飞机过境时间的前后5分钟内。观测仪器：手持式红外温度计（寒旱所5#）。
4．地物光谱；观测仪器：北师大ASD光谱仪，350～2 500 nm。参考板信息：6月15日前使用40%参考板，之后改换成20%参考板。观测样方：五里墩农田样方。观测目标：玉米地、土壤、含水量已知的土壤等地物光谱。数据存储：数据包括原始数据和预处理后的数据。原始数据是光谱仪直接产生的二进制文件，用ViewSpecPro软件可以打开，详细观测记录见数据文件每天的观测记录；预处理得到的为反射率数据，格式为文本格式。
5．多角度光谱；观测仪器：北师大ASD光谱仪，350～2 500 nm；参考板信息6月15日前使用40%参考板，之后改换成20%参考板；多角度观测架包括北京师范大学旧多角度观测架一台、北师大2008年新制多角度观测架一台、遥感所新制多角度观测架一台。观测样方：五里墩农田样方。样本类型：玉米。存储方式： 本数据集包括原始数据和处理后数据，原始数据由二进制文件和记录表构成，二进制文件可由ViewSpecPro软件读取；处理后的反射率和透射率是文本格式。
6．鱼眼相机测量LAI；观测仪器：佳能EOS40D相机和佳能EF15/28鱼眼镜头以及相机支架。观测样方：五里墩农田样方。观测对象：玉米。拍摄方法：大部分照片为从上向下拍摄，较高的作物拍摄时采取从下向上拍摄，特殊情况下，比如光线太强时，采取向下倾斜45度拍摄。具体拍摄情况见当天鱼眼相机测量记录。存储方式：该数据包括拍摄的原始照片，以及用can_eye5.0软件处理以后的结果。原始照片格式为JPG，处理结果文件格式为Excel表格。
7．LAI-2000测量LAI；观测仪器：LAI-2000。观测样方：临泽站内样方、五里墩农田样方。观测对象：玉米存储方式：在每天的记录表中记录了测量时间、视角盖度数、观测模式和重复次数，以及当天的天气情况等。LAI-2000每隔一段时间导出数据一次，以txt存放的数据，每个数据有唯一的ID号，后期处理中根据每条记录的ID号来确定数据。 本数据集包括原始数据以及后处理数据。原始数据包括Word记录表格和txt数据文件；后处理数据为Excel表格。
样方样带的分布和编号信息请参见元数据“黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽站加密观测区样方样带布置”，样方位置见临泽站加密观测站样方样带坐标.xls。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the Wide-angle Infrared Dual-mode line/area Array Scanner (WiDAS) in the context of remote sensing data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 宽角红外双模线/面阵扫描仪（WiDAS）是在遥感数据采集中的一种设备。
Definition.AnswerEn: The Wide-angle Infrared Dual-mode line/area Array Scanner (WiDAS) is an airborne instrument used in remote sensing that consists of four CCD cameras, one mid-infrared thermal imager (AGEMA 550), and one thermal infrared thermal imager (S60). It simultaneously captures data in visible/near-infrared (CCD) bands at five angles, mid-infrared (MIR) at seven angles, and thermal infrared (TIR) at seven angles, providing comprehensive imaging capabilities for various remote sensing applications.
Definition.AnswerCn: 宽角红外双模式线/面阵扫描仪（WiDAS）是一种用于遥感的空载仪器，包含四个CCD相机、一台中红外热成像仪（AGEMA 550）和一台热红外热成像仪（S60）。它同时在可见/近红外（CCD）波段以五个角度、中红外（MIR）以七个角度、热红外（TIR）以七个角度捕获数据，为各种遥感应用提供全面的成像能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying data collection techniques can be inferred from the use of varied instruments like WiDAS, ASD spectrometers, and LAI-2000 in understanding soil moisture, temperature, and vegetation characteristics?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从使用WiDAS、ASD光谱仪和LAI-2000等多种仪器来理解土壤湿度、温度和植被特征中，可以推断出一些潜在的数据收集技术。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of WiDAS, ASD spectrometers, and LAI-2000 reflects a comprehensive data collection strategy that integrates multi-angle, multi-spectral, and multi-temporal observations. WiDAS offers simultaneous data from visible, near-infrared, mid-infrared, and thermal infrared wavelengths, allowing for detailed analysis of surface properties and conditions. The ASD spectrometer provides high-resolution spectral data, which is crucial for identifying specific characteristics of vegetation and soil. The LAI-2000 measures leaf area index, capturing the vegetation structure and density. These varied instruments collectively enable a robust understanding of environmental conditions by capturing diverse data points such as soil moisture content, surface temperature, and vegetation characteristics. This approach suggests a focus on capturing data at different scales and perspectives to ensure a comprehensive analysis of the study area.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: WiDAS、ASD光谱仪和LAI-2000的使用体现了一种综合的数据收集策略，整合了多角度、多光谱和多时间观测。WiDAS提供来自可见光、近红外、中红外和热红外波长的同步数据，使得对表面特性和条件的详细分析成为可能。ASD光谱仪提供高分辨率的光谱数据，这对于识别植被和土壤的特定特征至关重要。LAI-2000测量叶面积指数，捕捉植被的结构和密度。这些多样化的仪器共同使得对环境条件的深入理解成为可能，通过捕捉土壤水分含量、表面温度和植被特征等多样的数据点。这种方法表明，关注于在不同尺度和视角下捕捉数据，以确保对研究区域的全面分析。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes inaccuracies in soil moisture data collection methods when utilizing both manual sampling and automated sensors?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用手动采样和自动传感器时，导致土壤湿度数据收集方法不准确的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Inaccuracies in soil moisture data collection may arise from the differences in sampling techniques and tools used. Manual sampling with a ring knife might introduce variability due to human error or inconsistent sampling depths, especially when collecting 0-5cm surface soil samples. Automated sensors like the ML2X soil moisture rapid tester could face calibration issues or environmental interference, leading to discrepancies between manual and sensor-based measurements. Additionally, the use of different sampling locations and frequencies might lead to variations in the collected data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度数据收集中的不准确性可能源于所使用的采样技术和工具的差异。使用环刀进行手动采样可能会由于人为错误或采样深度不一致而引入变异性，尤其是在收集0-5厘米表层土壤样本时。像ML2X土壤湿度快速测试仪这样的自动传感器可能面临校准问题或环境干扰，导致手动测量和传感器测量之间的差异。此外，使用不同的采样地点和频率可能会导致收集数据的变化。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are necessary to perform ground synchronous observations during an airborne remote sensing mission using a WiDAS instrument?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在使用WiDAS仪器进行空中遥感任务时，进行地面同步观测所需的程序步骤如下：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Ground synchronous observations during an airborne remote sensing mission using a WiDAS instrument involve several procedural steps: 1) Soil moisture observation using a ring knife for sampling and an ML2X soil moisture meter for repeated measurements. 2) Surface radiation temperature observation with handheld infrared thermometers, where calibration is performed using black body temperature data to correct raw measurements. 3) Corn canopy component temperature observation in multiple directions using a handheld infrared thermometer, ensuring recordings are made within the timeframe of aircraft overpass. 4) Ground object spectral measurements using an ASD spectrometer, where data is stored as both raw binary files and processed reflectance data. 5) Multi-angle spectral observation using multiple observation frames and an ASD spectrometer. 6) Fish-eye camera LAI measurement involving photographing with a Canon EOS40D and processing images with can_eye5.0 software. 7) LAI measurements using a LAI-2000 instrument, with data recorded, processed, and stored in both original and processed formats.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在使用WiDAS仪器进行空中遥感任务的地面同步观测中，涉及几个程序步骤：1）使用环刀进行土壤湿度观测，并使用ML2X土壤湿度计进行重复测量。2）使用手持红外温度计观测表面辐射温度，校准通过黑体温度数据来修正原始测量值。3）使用手持红外温度计从多个方向观测玉米冠层组件温度，确保在飞机经过的时间内进行记录。4）使用ASD光谱仪进行地面物体光谱测量，数据以原始二进制文件和处理后的反射率数据存储。5）使用多个观测框架和ASD光谱仪进行多角度光谱观测。6）使用鱼眼相机进行LAI测量，使用Canon EOS40D拍照，并使用can_eye5.0软件处理图像。7）使用LAI-2000仪器进行LAI测量，数据以原始和处理格式记录、处理和存储。
